1.0.name: wordpress/flickr-carousel-gallery
1.0.description:
flickr Carousel gallery : flickr carousel gallery uses flickr api to Fetch flickr video Thumb and make carousel from them.On click on those thumbs thumb enlarge.

Installation Guide:

1.Upload the plugin to your blog and just activate it.

2.Goto your Setting>flickr carousel gallery and then Edit its data as per requirement.

3.Use Tiny mce editor button to add shortcodes to your editor.
